title: Permanently in Leaverbuster Queue, Vel'Koz has two "classic" skins
body: I tried to play Vel'koz in team builder while he is free on 2/4/15, and in the skin select he had two "classic" skins. Naturally I chose the second one, but as soon as I click find group I am in a leaverbuster 5:00 minute ban. At the end of the ban, a message pops up saying something along the lines of invalid skin, I forgot to screencap. I change back to the other classic skin and attempt to re-enter, but I get another ban. Exit pop-up and try again, ban timer resets. The bug repeated after re-logging. Also, I am now constantly in Leaverbuster, in anygame mode with it resetting constantly.

replies.body: Yup, he's got two eyes now! {{champion:161}} {{champion:161}}
it is intended for the timer to restart from 5 min each time you queue. You must wait through that 5 min timer every time you queue until your punishment is worked off.
I have the same problem with Nami having 2 (classic)skins. but since I paid for her newer skins I use those. I don't want to risk using her classic skins now though with your recent bug
